summary: I WAS SENT A LETTER STATING THAT MY VEHICLE HAS BEEN RECALLED FOR A DEFECT IN THE AIRBAG. I CALLED A FEW MONTHS LATER AND ASKED WHEN IT QILL GWT FIXED AND WAS TOLD WHEN THE PART SHIPMENT COMES IN A WILL RECEIVE A LETTER OR A CALL STATNG WHEN TO BRING IT IN. IF THE PROBLEM WAS'T GOING TO BE FIXED WHEN I RECIEVED THE LETTER ONE SHOULDN'T HAVE BEEN SENT OUT. THIS PROCESS IS TAKING LONGER THAN IT SHOULD AND NEEDS TO BE FIXED SOON. WHO KNOWS WHEN AN ACCIDENT IS GOING TO HAPPEN WETHER ITS MY FAULT OR NOT, ME AND MY FAMILY ARE GOING TO BE SERIOUSLY HURT. THEN I WILL BE FORCED TO TAKE LEGAL ACTIONS.
